entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low 6. POP 60%

entry.title: Tuesday: A few showers. High 9.
entry.summary: A few showers ending in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 early in the afternoon. High 9. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Monday 10 April 2023
